mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, post_id, reply, admin_name) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{post_id}, #{reply}, #{admin_name})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where post_id = #{post_id}
